name: PUZZLE BOBBLE UNIVERSE™
description:
The legendary puzzle game PUZZLE BOBBLE comes full speed to the Nintendo 3DS!

String together colourful bubbles and burst them in the exhilarating puzzles for which the game has come to be known, now upgraded with an all-new feeling of depth.

Experience tons of new features such as Challenge Mode and the trophy system.

Brace yourself for the 3-D reincarnation of PUZZLE BOBBLE!
